title: Luxembourg Private Debt To GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Luxembourg increased to 477.40 percent in 2021 from 464.80 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Luxembourg averaged 323.10 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 477.40 percent in 2021 and a record low of 145.10 percent in 1998. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP. This page provides - Luxembourg Private Debt To Gdp- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: OECD
